abstract: Target chief financial officer John J Mulligan is promoted to newly created role of chief operating officer; will be succeed by Cathy Smith, former chief financial officer at Express Scripts.
lead_paragraph: Target is making more executive changes, promoting its chief financial officer, John J. Mulligan, to the newly created role of chief operating officer.

headline.main: Target Promotes C.F.O. to Operating Chief
headline.print_headline: Target Promotes C.F.O. to Operating Chief

snippet: Target is making more executive changes, promoting its chief financial officer, John J. Mulligan, to the newly created role of chief operating officer.
